医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
减少叶酸摄入量可以支持衰老动物模型更健康的新陈代谢在生命科学联盟发表的一项研究中，德克萨斯农工大学农业生命研究中心的科学家发现，减少叶酸摄入量可以支持衰老动物模型中更健康的新陈代谢，挑战了高叶酸摄入普遍有益于健康的传统观念。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Decreasing-folate-intake-can-support-healthier-metabolisms-in-aging-animal-models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Decreasing-folate-intake-can-support-healthier-metabolisms-in-aging-animal-models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e390e79-62ce-43ad-ad63-aa18f61ff33f Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:31:12 -0400 Decreasing folate intake can support healthier metabolisms in aging animal models
肥大细胞被发现在过敏反应期间捕获和利用中性粒细胞肥大细胞以其在过敏反应中的作用而闻名，长期以来一直被认为是我们免疫系统的关键角色。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Mast-cells-found-to-capture-and-employ-neutropils-during-allergic-reactions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Mast-cells-found-to-capture-and-employ-neutropils-during-allergic-reactions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c147d06a-e073-4425-ac57-4ce39a091cc4 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:23:00 -0400 Mast cells found to capture and employ neutrophils during allergic reactions
研究显示，公共保险受益人不太可能接受糖尿病和肥胖症药物南加州大学的一项新研究表明，最有可能从治疗糖尿病和肥胖症的新药中受益的公共保险个人比拥有私人保险的人获得这些药物的可能性更小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Public-insurance-recipients-less-likely-to-receive-diabetes-and-obesity-drug-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Public-insurance-recipients-less-likely-to-receive-diabetes-and-obesity-drug-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bbc5db1-07cb-4a86-aaa7-901e9caa36c0 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:17:21 -0400 Public insurance recipients less likely to receive diabetes and obesity drug, study reveals
FDA 加速批准首个工程化 T 细胞疗法，用于治疗成人滑膜肉瘤美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 已加速批准免疫疗法 afamitresgene autoleuecel（Tecelra®，也称为 afami-cel），用于治疗患有一种罕见软组织癌（称为滑膜肉瘤）的成人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/FDA-grants-accelerated-approval-for-first-engineered-T-cell-therapy-to-treat-adults-with-synovial-sarcoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/FDA-grants-accelerated-approval-for-first-engineered-T-cell-therapy-to-treat-adults-with-synovial-sarcoma.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=beb45327-ec15-41d1-b7a9-a87466f5a340 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:09:48 -0400 FDA grants accelerated approval for first engineered T cell therapy to treat adults with synovial sarcoma
新研究将肥胖与巨单胞菌联系起来最近发表在《细胞宿主与微生物》杂志上的一项研究从中国的大规模肥胖人群中发现了一种潜在的与肥胖相关的细菌——巨单胞菌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/New-study-links-obesity-to-bacter-Megamonas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/New-study-links-obesity-to-bacteria-Megamonas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f52866d-2636-4197-96f4-f56695718c9f Fri, 02 Aug 2024 15:03:59 -0400 New study links obesity to bacterium Megamonas
突破性研究确定了胶质母细胞瘤浸润大脑的途径由麦克马斯特大学辛格实验室领导的加拿大和美国研究小组发现了一种癌细胞浸润大脑的新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Breakthrough-research-identizes-pathway-used-by-glioblastoma-to-infiltrate-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Breakthrough-research-identizes-pathway-used-by-glioblastoma-to-infiltrate-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55e71f94-0254-4e2a-9c4d-6cd260c17277 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 14:47:35 -0400 Breakthrough research identifies pathway used by glioblastoma to infiltrate the brain
使用先进的 CRISPR 提高 CAR-T 细胞疗法的效率CAR-T 细胞在治疗特定血癌方面非常有效。然而，这种新疗法仍然面临挑战，该疗法于 2017 年在美国首次获得批准，一年后在欧洲获得批准，用于治疗急性淋巴细胞白血病 (ALL)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Using-advanced-CRISPR-to-boost-efficiency-of-CAR-T-cell-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Using-advanced-CRISPR-to-boost-efficiency-of-CAR-T-cell-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c31f31df-d173-4010-864a-b8c11f844ca4 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 14:32:00 -0400 Using advanced CRISPR to boost efficiency of CAR-T cell therapies
研究强调医疗保健领域对可持续人工智能解决方案的需求与世界其他领域类似，人工智能（AI）的光速发展已经进入医疗保健领域，特别是放射学领域。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Research-highlights-need-for-sustainable-AI-solutions-in-healthcare.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Research-highlights-need-for-sustainable-AI-solutions-in-healthcare.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=28aa0901-3c5e-4512-89a4-584006a96e82 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 14:16:00 -0400 Research highlights need for sustainable AI solutions in healthcare
奥林匹克运动员克服健康挑战，达到运动巅峰运动员们已经完成训练并实现了他们的梦想，巴黎奥运会之旅将于 7 月 26 日星期五开始。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Olympic-athletes-overcome-health-challenges-to-reach-the-pinnacle-of-their-sport.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Olympic-athletes-overcome-health-challenges-to-reach-the-pinnacle-of-their-sport.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4253c4d-57f1-48f1-bebf-f5dbbd9fd626 Fri, 02 Aug 2024 13:35:24 -0400 Olympic athletes overcome health challenges to reach the pinnacle of their sport
德克萨斯农工大学的 Alva O. Ferdinand 博士加入国家农村健康咨询委员会德克萨斯农工大学公共卫生学院卫生政策与管理系主任阿尔瓦·费迪南德博士被美国卫生与公共服务部部长任命为卫生资源和服务管理局国家农村卫生咨询委员会成员泽维尔·贝塞拉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Texas-AMe28099s-Dr-Alva-O-Ferdinand-joins-National-Advisory-Committee-on-Rural-Health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240802/Texas-AMe28099s-Dr-Alva-O-Ferdinand-joins-National-Advisory-Committee-on-Rural-Health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ba58851-983a-4a2c-a195-b706c62f0c5b Fri, 02 Aug 2024 13:23:22 -0400 Texas A&M’s Dr. Alva O. Ferdinand joins National Advisory Committee on Rural Health
